text: Richard Daniels (1864–1939) was a Welsh-born American film actor. Richard Daniels may also refer to: *Mickey Daniels (Richard Daniels Jr., 1914–1970), American actor *Dick Daniels (Richard Bernard Daniels, born 1944), American football defensive back *Richard Daniels, a character in The Son of Dr. Jekyll ==See also== *Rik Daniëls (born 1962), Belgian television director *Richard Daniel (1900–1986), German soldier *Richard Daniel (priest) (1681–1739), Church of Ireland priest
title: Richard Daniels (disambiguation)
